Hi,
In order to fix issue #862. I creaetd a UI sample for reconnect error page. Before my implementation it was lacking auto image resizing and quality of error photo was a bit bad. It was also too bright for the general design of the app. I created a new error photo with the same size (14kb) as before but higher quality and with a bit better visuals (i think). I also changed the color of error page from white to general zulip background color.

changed the color of error page from white to general zulip background color.

@Enes The background color in Zulip depends on dark vs light theme.
I'm not convinced by the globe icon change, but the scaling fix in #D1292 seems helpful. Could someone review the code?
(Also, Enes , see here for how to correctly link to Zulip Desktop PRs/issues: https://zulip.com/development-community/#linking-to-github-issues-and-pull-requests.)
